per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=tt= time/10;
per_frame_3=wave_r = sin(15*tt/2)/2+0.5;
per_frame_4=wave_g = cos(tt/3)/2+0.5;
per_frame_5=wave_b = cos(23*tt/2)/2+0.5;
per_pixel_1=rot=pow(-ang,3)/(bass+9)-(sin(ang)+(bass_att*.8));
per_pixel_2=zoom=sin(pow(rad,3))+(bass_att*.8);
warp_1=`sampler sampler_fw_clouds;
warp_2=`shader_body
warp_3=`{
warp_4=`    // sample previous frame
warp_5=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz-GetBlur1(uv);
warp_6=`ret+=tex2D(sampler_fw_clouds,uv)*0.5;
warp_7=`}
comp_1=`float2 rs;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`
comp_5=`
comp_6=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5)*aspect.xy;
comp_7=`
comp_8=`rs.x = ang/3.14 + q28;
comp_9=`rs.y = .1/(.05+length (uv1))+time*.5;
comp_10=`
comp_11=`uv = frac(rs);
comp_12=`uv1 = frac(rs);
comp_13=`float3 ret1 = tex2D(sampler_main, uv) + GetBlur1(uv);
comp_14=`
comp_15=`float2 hor = float2 (texsize.z,0);
comp_16=`float2 ver = float2 (0,texsize.w);
comp_17=`float dx = GetPixel (uv-hor) - GetPixel (uv+hor);
comp_18=`float dy = GetPixel (uv-ver) - GetPixel (uv+ver);
comp_19=`float2 dz = float2 (dx,dy);
comp_20=`
comp_21=`uv1 = .3*cos(uv1*16) - 4*dz;;
comp_22=`float3 dots = saturate(.04/length(uv1));
comp_23=`
comp_24=`ret1 = 4*(1+bass_att)*dots*(.6-ret1);
comp_25=`
comp_26=`ret = .8*ret1;
comp_27=`}
